name: Window.pagehide_event
description: The pagehide event is sent to a Window when the browser hides the current page in the process of presenting a different page from the session's history.

refs.name: HTML Living Standard
refs.description: The definition of 'pagehide' in the 'HTML Living Standard' specification.

refs.name: HTML5
refs.description: The definition of 'pagehide' in the 'HTML5' specification.
